text: The 1946–47 Kentucky Wildcats men's basketball team represented University of Kentucky in intercollegiate basketball during the 1946–47 season. The team finished the season with 34–3 overall record and was retroactively named the national champion by the Premo-Porretta Power Poll. ==References== Kentucky Category:Kentucky Wildcats men's basketball seasons
title: 1946–47 Kentucky Wildcats men's basketball team
